title: Garlicky tomato salad
ingredients: ['1 large soft lettuce, large leaves torn into smaller pieces', '4 large or 6 small ripe plum tomatoes, about 500 g (1 lb 2 oz) in total, sliced', '20 cherry tomatoes, about 225 g (8 oz) in total, halved', '16 fresh basil leaves', '1½ tbsp toasted pumpkin seeds', '1½ tbsp toasted sunflower seeds', 'Garlic vinaigrette', '1 small garlic clove, very finely chopped', '1½ tsp red wine vinegar', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
